database.name: VIEW C_YEAR_V
database.view: SELECT c_year.c_year_id, c_year.c_calendar_id, c_year.ad_client_id, ad_org.ad_org_id, c_year.isactive, c_year.created, c_year.createdby, c_year.updated, c_year.updatedby, c_year.year AS yearname, c_year.description FROM c_year, ad_org WHERE c_year.c_calendar_id = ad_org.c_calendar_id
